name: Summer Shake
description:
Survival game about collecting fruits and getting fried to death.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys to move your chick

Spacebar to pause the game

End to..... end the game, duh

Q to open lil' summary

*more controls are introduced later on the game, be sure to check Q*

(Also the game is unsavable ran out of time to implement such thing)
